com.sponsorpay.publisher.interstitial.mediation
Class SPInterstitialMediationAdapter<V extends SPMediationAdapter>

java.lang.Object
  com.sponsorpay.publisher.interstitial.mediation.SPInterstitialMediationAdapter<V>

public abstract class SPInterstitialMediationAdapter<V extends SPMediationAdapter>
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for Interstitial Mediation adapter

This class defines the required methods to every adapter and provides convenience methods handling validation and events notifications. The SPMediationCoordinator will communicate the results back to the SPInterstitialClient.

Method Detail

isAdAvailable

public boolean isAdAvailable(android.content.Context context,
                             SPInterstitialAd ad)
Method called from the SPMediationCoordinator to check intersitial ads availability for this network.

Parameters:
context - The activity context
ad - The SPInterstitialAd for this query.
Returns:
true is an ad is available

show

public boolean show(android.app.Activity parentActivity,
                    SPInterstitialAd ad)
Method called from the SPMediationCoordinator to start an intersitial for this network. This method returns a boolean indicating if the ad was shown to the user. It will stores th SPInterstitialAd, the Activity and reset the clicked status.

Parameters:
parentActivity - The parent activity
ad - The SPInterstitialAd for this query.
Returns:
Boolean indicating that the ad was shown
